name: shoe-store
description: AI-powered shoe store application with web and mobile platforms

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run seed
scripts.stop: powershell -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Get-Process powershell -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_.MainWindowTitle -like '*shoe-store*'} | Stop-Process -Force"
